headline: Arizona attorney general: Biden sending US troops to secure Ukraine border is 'height of hypocrisy'
author: Fox News Staff
sentences: I think it's the ultimate height of hypocrisy that you literally have the president of the United States willing to risk our sons and daughters to secure Ukraine.
Millions of people in our country are less safe and in more danger as a result of the Biden administration's failure to secure our very own border.
The state's attorney general called out the hypocrisy from the administration for prioritizing Ukraine's border over America's southern border.
Mark Brnovich said on "The Faulkner Focus" Wednesday that the Biden border crisis has brought destruction to Arizona.
He should come here to the border and see firsthand the destruction his administration has wrought on Arizona.
Instead of going to New York City or sending the vice president to Central America to study the root causes.
And meanwhile, millions of drugs, pounds of drugs are flooding through our southern border.
The president's willing to risk our sons and daughters to secure the Ukrainian border.
MARK BRNOVICH: The blame lies with President Biden.
